DOC.brief_summary: This protocol seek determine efficacy reliability simple maneuver , jaw thrust maneuver , addition cricoid pressure , improve visualization airway anatomy video laryngoscopy . Hypothesis : The grade view glottis determine modified Cormack Lehane grade system anesthetized patient improve perform jaw thrust maneuver video laryngoscopy compare video laryngoscopy alone . Similarly , grade view cricoid pressure also improve jaw thrust maneuver .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age > 18 2 . Undergoing surgery general anesthesia endotracheal intubation 3 . Able give inform consent 1 . Trauma patient emergent case . 2 . Patients unable understand propose study 3 . Patients refuse participation
